title: Planned maintenance works on Punggol LRT

title_translations.zh-Hans: 隆戈 LRT 计划维护工作
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan terancang di Punggol LRT
title_translations.ta: Punggol LRT இல் திட்டமிடப்பட்ட பராமரிப்புப் பணிகள்

updates.text: We will be conducting maintenance works on the Punggol LRT system this Sunday, 2 Aug 2020. Train service will operate as usual on one platform while the other will be closed for works. Service on both platforms will commence as usual on Monday, 3 Aug.
